We Are Your Small Business Web Design / Development Headquarters. Get Your Business Online For Only $150 Per Month.

At Eydev, we specialize in creating websites for small businesses all over the world. Our websites are built mobile first, by hand, with site performance in mind. This means your site will load fast, which will increase SEO, and therefore increase pageviews and revenue.

Our
Process

Design

Our designs are mobile-first. 60% off all web traffic comes from mobile devices, and that number is growing every year. Designs are tailored to your business.

Development

It's time to code. Our sites are built from scratch. No pre-built template fluff that can slow your site down. Each site we build is responsive on every mobile device.

Delivery

The moment you've been waiting for. After our rigorous quality assurance process is complete, we deliver your site to you. We host your site at no extra cost.

Support

Your site is live! Great. We'll monitor your site and review analytics post-launch to let you know where optimizations can be made. Need to update your site? We will complete changes on the same day.
